trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_SEQ_00<tab>Though his face betrays little sign of panic, Hien is plainly desperate to find Yotsuyu before something terrible happens.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_TODO_00<tab>Question residents of Yuzuka Manor.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_TODO_01<tab>Search for signs of Yotsuyu.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_TODO_02<tab>Search for signs of Yotsuyu.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_TODO_03<tab>Search for signs of Yotsuyu.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_TODO_04<tab>Inspect the bamboo hat.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Without Tsuyu, I cannot see how the prisoner exchange─or indeed the peace process at large─can proceed. We have to find her, and soon.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>Her memory must have returned. Why else would she run?
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_HIEN_000_010<tab>It seems Tsuyu has gone unrecognized thus far, but kami help us if someone catches a clear view of her face. I must find her before that happens.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_HIEN_000_011<tab>The responsibility for her disappearance─for <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> of this─lies with me. But I would ask for your aid nonetheless.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>We are at your service, Lord Hien, now as before. Let us make the crossing and begin our search.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_ALISAIE_000_013<tab>You go on ahead. Someone should let Yugiri know what we've learned. I'll join you on the other side.

TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_HIEN_000_014<tab>We have no way of knowing where Tsuyu is headed, so we had best divide our forces. I will take Kusakari and its surrounds; Alphinaud, if you would take the road to Castrum Fluminis?

TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_HIEN_000_015<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─forgive me, but could I ask you to interrogate the residents of Yuzuka Manor? One of the Namazu may well have seen our quarry.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_HIEN_000_016<tab>If everyone is in agreement, let us board the skiff, and hope the kami smile upon our efforts!
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_GYOSAN_000_020<tab>Welcome to Yuzuka Manor. Yes, yes. If there is anything you care to know, you need only─ Hm? A pale-skinned woman?
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_GYOSAN_000_021<tab>I have seen no such traveler, I am sorry to say. Most sorry. Scaly-skinned Namazu, on the other hand, we have in abundance!
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_GYOKU_000_022<tab>...Unusually pale skin? Yes, yes! I saw this woman on the way back from my fishing trip.

TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_GYOKU_000_023<tab>She had just crossed the shallows east of here, and was headed in a northeasterly direction...for the most part. Her steps did not seem certain. If you hurry, you might still catch her.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_GYOSAN_000_025<tab>No, no. Still no pale-skinned females here. Only grey.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_GYOKU_000_026<tab>I thought you would be on your way by now. Did you lose interest in finding your friend?
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_SYSTEM_100_028<tab>You see no sign of Yotsuyu to the north. Perhaps she is somewhere farther off to the northeast...
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_SYSTEM_100_029<tab>Still no sign of Yotsuyu. Perhaps she is yet farther to the northeast...
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Yotsuyu is nowhere to be seen, but lying on the ground a short distance to the north, you spy a familiar-looking wide-brimmed hat...
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>A cursory glance is all that is required to confirm your suspicions: it is the same hat Yotsuyu was wearing when you found her in Sakazuki.

TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_HIEN_000_041<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Before you ask, our search of Kusakari and its surroundings has yielded exactly naught─save this chance reunion with you, I suppose.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_YUGIRI_000_042<tab>Mistress Alisaie has gone to assist her brother at the castrum. It was she who informed me of the situation. I joined Lord Hien here shortly thereafter.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_HIEN_000_043<tab>How did you fare at Yuzuka Manor? Any sign of our missing guest?
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_HIEN_000_044<tab>...Towards <var 1A 02 /var>Namai<var 1A 01 /var>? By the kami! If the villagers recognize her, it will not end well.
TEXT_STMBDD102_03071_HIEN_100_045<tab>We must hurry. Yugiri and I will check the paddies; the village square is yours!
